sample_docs: Beyond Compliance: Comply and Thrive in a PSD2 World The percentage of transactions processed through SCA-compliant payment rails is high across the UK and Europe with over 90% of authentication requests being SCA compliant. This has had a positive impact in the form of lower fraud rates, but it has also come at the cost of higher rates of abandonment, failures, and declines. Register for a lively discussion with Alan Goode, a leading expert on identity, authentication and biometrics, to investigate how behavioral biometrics can enhance SCA deployments, resolve the issues that have become apparent now that SCA is mandatory, and witness how behavioral indicators can be used to identify fraud in the payment flow. Watch the Webinar Beyond Compliance: Comply and Thrive in a PSD2 World The percentage of transactions processed through SCA-compliant payment rails is high across the UK and Europe with over 90% of authentication requests being SCA compliant. This has had a positive impact in the form of lower fraud rates, but it has also come at the cost of higher rates of abandonment, failures, and declines. Register for a lively discussion with Alan Goode, a leading expert on identity, authentication and biometrics, to investigate how behavioral biometrics can enhance SCA deployments, resolve the issues that have become apparent now that SCA is mandatory, and witness how behavioral indicators can be used to identify fraud in the payment flow.

Join Us, And Let's Beat Fraud and AML Together. You are personally invited to attend our exclusive in-person event along with your peers from neighbouring banks. Date : 19 September 2023 City : Copenhagen, Denmark Venue: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Copenhagen Address: Amager Boul. 70, 2300 København, Denmark Time : 11am - 3pm (including lunch) While retail banks often compete, we believe a different approach is required when fighting Fraud and Money Laundering. We believe that FI's are stronger together because a problem shared is a problem halved. Experts from our Global Advisory and Threat Intelligence teams want to hear more about your challenges, help you supercharge your strategies, and help you emerge victorious against Fraud and AML. Agenda: 11:00​ - Introductions​ 20 second intros from everyone in the room, and 15 minutes introducing BioCatch​ 11:20​ - Fraud Intelligence Relevant to You​ Intelligence from our EMEA Fraud Report and Emerging Nordic Threats​ 11:50​ - 10m NETWORKING BREAK​ 12:00 - Audience Challenges: Extended Discussion​ 12:30​ - Panel Style Discussion: Fraud Fighting Together - Success Stories from the Field​ Hear from some of our BioCatch customers and how working with BioCatch led to their fraud fighting success.​ 13:15 - 45m LUNCH: MID-SESSION BREAK & NETWORKING​ 14:00 - Guest Speaker​ 14:30 - The Importance of Moving with the Times​ Modern Solutions for Modern Threat types. information about our Scams and Mule solutions​ 15:00​ - What Did We Miss Today? + Wrap Up​ A chance to define what was helpful today, what was missing and what we can do to follow up.​ See you there. Your customer can't always spot the scam. BioCatch can. In the age of GenAI, BioCatch recognizes that detecting today's diverse scam types requires more than simply monitoring transactional data. That's why BioCatch solutions also analyze real-time user behaviour to uncover subtle signs of manipulation - helping financial institutions prevent a wide range of scams, including impersonation, investment, romance, business email compromise (BEC), purchase scams, and more. Spotting the signs of an investment scam. Financial scams spare no one — affecting people of all ages, backgrounds. Research shows that even the most tech-savvy individuals are often among the most frequent victims. Behavioral intelligence offers powerful protection across the scam spectrum, including threats like investment scams. Fighting scams , delivering results. As scammers evolve their tactics, fraud prevention must evolve even faster. BioCatch empowers financial institutions to stay ahead and detect a wider range of scams in real time with a single, unified solution - stopping fraud before the damage is done. See what our customers are saying about BioCatch. Proven results from our customers: $100M in scam payments prevented by one regional bank in the U.S. in 2024 67% decline in social engineering scam losses within months of deployment at a top LATAM bank 8x ROI achieved by a top-tier bank in EMEA, with a 70% reduction in scam losses totaling more than €4 million annually $30M protected per year at a leading Australian bank through BioCatch's advanced scam prevention solution Your customer can't always spot the scam. BioCatch can. In the age of GenAI, BioCatch recognizes that detecting today's diverse scam types requires more than simply monitoring transactional data. That's why BioCatch solutions also analyze real-time user behaviour to uncover subtle signs of manipulation - helping financial institutions prevent a wide range of scams, including impersonation, investment, romance, business email compromise (BEC), purchase scams, and more. Research shows that even the most tech-savvy individuals are often among the most frequent victims. Behavioral intelligence offers powerful protection across the scam spectrum, including threats like investment scams. Fighting scams , delivering results. As scammers evolve their tactics, fraud prevention must evolve even faster. BioCatch empowers financial institutions to stay ahead and detect a wider range of scams in real time with a single, unified solution - stopping fraud before the damage is done. See what our customers are saying about BioCatch. Proven results from our customers: in scam payments prevented by one regional bank in the U.S. in 2024 decline in social engineering scam losses within months of deployment at a top LATAM bank ROI achieved by a top-tier bank in EMEA, with a 70% reduction in scam losses totaling more than €4 million annually protected per year at a leading Australian bank through BioCatch's advanced scam prevention solution Your customers are being coached. BioCatch knows the signs. Fraudsters exploit human behavior. We use it as a line of defense. Behavioral intelligence sees what credentials can't Even when victims use their own device and credentials, BioCatch spots what others can't: subtle signs of manipulation, stress, hesitation, or coaching that can signal scam activity in real time. Unmatched visibility, continuous insights, full-session coverage BioCatch tracks user behavior from login to payment, surfacing anomalies like segmented typing, session dead time, and erratic mouse movements. These are subtle yet telling signs of manipulation in progress, empowering teams to intervene before any money leaves the account. Built to detect hard-to-spot scams Scams are evolving. BioCatch uncovers the behavioral patterns behind today's most deceptive tactics, from impersonation to investment scams and beyond. In 2024, BioCatch prevented more than $100 million in high-risk scam payments at a mid-sized U.S. bank, stopping fraud that would have slipped through traditional controls. Behavior reveals what scams try to hide. Financial scams spare no one — affecting people of all ages, backgrounds. Research shows that even the most tech-savvy individuals are often among the most frequent victims. Behavioral intelligence offers powerful protection across the scam spectrum, including threats like investment scams. Traditional systems see what's entered. Behavior sees why. Legacy fraud solutions often miss scams because everything appears legitimate - the right user, the usual device, and valid credentials. BioCatch goes beyond static checks, analyzing real-time behavior to detect emotional states like hesitation, pressure, confusion, and distraction – all critical signs of manipulation in progress. Together, we can prevent fraud and financial crime. J oin our global advisors and fraud intelligence experts for a 30-minute deep dive into the latest tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) now exploited by fraudsters in your country to scam your customers and harm your brand.

SPARK Matrix: Behavioral Biometrics and Device Intelligence, 2024 With the advent of Generative AI, fraudsters have found new ways to commit fraud and manipulate users that are challenging legacy fraud detection controls. This report explores cutting-edge technologies that passively and continuously authenticate users by analyzing their behavioral and cognitive attributes, enhancing security while ensuring a seamless customer experience. Download the Quadrant Knowledge Solutions SPARK Matrix to uncover: • Market Dynamics and Trends : Find out what is behind the rise of APP scams, synthetic identity fraud, mule accounts, and other fraud risks and shifting financial institutions to evaluate behavioral and device intelligence solutions. • Competitive Landscape : Get an in-depth analysis of the leading vendors in the behavioral biometrics and device intelligence market. Understand their strengths, market presence, and unique value propositions. • Technology Differentiators : Explore the top competitive factors that set leading vendors apart, such as the maturity of AI and ML models, false positive reduction capabilities, customizable risk scoring models, and comprehensive analytics. Top Trends Shaping Anti-Money Laundering in Asia Pacific in 2024 Anti-money laundering (AML) efforts are becoming increasingly challenging for financial institutions as criminals have improved their ability to move money through faster payments, crypto exchanges, and other methods. A fragmented regulatory landscape with different levels of maturity and a lack of cross-institution data sharing is also contributing to the problem. Download Top Trends Shaping Anti-Money Laundering in Asia Pacific in 2024, the latest report by leading advisory firm, Forrester Research, to learn about the top AML trends, including changes in technology adoption and regulatory requirements, and strategies AML professionals can deploy to stay ahead of the problem.
